models.services: Each service represents a consulting offering you provide through Local Tech Labs, describing what's included and who it's for.
models.intro: The introductory content that sets the tone for your consulting approach.
models.cta: The call-to-action configuration for booking consultations.
models.localTechLabsCallout: A subtle plug for your AI voice agent business with a link to the main site.

relationships: Services stand alone as individual offerings
The CTA applies to all services (shared booking link)
The Local Tech Labs callout is separate from the main services

intro.headline: Let's Build Something Together
intro.body: I help teams navigate the rapidly evolving AI landscapeâ€”whether that's architecting agentic systems, modernizing your web presence, or providing ongoing technical leadership. With hands-on experience building production AI systems and a pragmatic approach to technology, I focus on solutions that actually ship.

services.title: Strategic AI Consulting
services.description: One-on-one sessions to help you understand where AI fits in your business. We'll cut through the hype, identify high-impact opportunities, and create a practical roadmap for implementation. Ideal for founders and technical leaders exploring agentic architectures, LLM integration, or AI-powered workflows.

services.title: Website Development
services.description: Full-service website design, development, and ongoing management. From modern React applications to marketing sites that convert, I handle the technical complexity so you can focus on your business. Includes performance optimization, SEO fundamentals, and a maintainable codebase.

services.title: Fractional CTO
services.description: Part-time technical leadership for startups and growing teams. I'll help you make architecture decisions, build engineering culture, evaluate build-vs-buy tradeoffs, and keep your technical strategy aligned with business goals. Perfect for non-technical founders or teams between senior hires.

cta.subtext: 30-minute conversation to explore how I can help

localTechLabsCallout.text: Interested in AI voice agents for your business?
